content: --रुद् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अघं रोदिति स्वकर्माक्षमतया यस्मात्, रुद-अपादाने क्विप्] {1} ‘making sin weep and fly’, <ab>N.</ab> of a Mantra which destroys sin; fearfully howling (?). {2} [अघे व्यसने रोदिति न तत्प्रतीकाराय घटते, क्विप्] one who only weeps in times of calamity, but does not try to get over them.
